document: Cocommutative Hopf Algebras with Antipode by Moss Eisenberg Sweedler B.S., Massachusetts Institute of Technology (1963) SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY at the MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY August, 1965 Signature of Author Department of Mathematics, August 31, 1965 Certified by Thesis Supervisor Accepted by Chairman, Departmental Committee on Graduate Students
